summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Arch Avenue from West Holgate Street to West Massachusetts Street; Walnut Avenue, from West Holgate Street to Arch Avenue, and West Holgate Street from the east margin of 41st Avenue Southwest to the east margin of Arch Avenue, all in the City of Seattle all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 34419, of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
